chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Shadow in Shienar
chapters.info: Lord Captain Geofram Bornhald, p. 71 (63)—Lord Captain of a band of the Children of the Light. He is a principal conspirator in the plot to overthrow Queen Morgase of Andor. Like all Children of the Light, he despises anyone trained in the White Tower. He is the best battle commander amongst the Children, with the exception of Pedron Niall himself. See also Bornhald, Dain.
